title: The Brothers of Beauville
description: Oscar-nominated short about three brothers who have impressive noses, inherited from family through generations.
altHero: a middle-aged French man brings a tray of cheese and grapes to a table with two other men
alt1: one of the men shoots little cheese cubes out of his nose
alt2: another man shoots wine out of his nose into a glass
alt3: the third man snorts a box of toothpicks into his nose
alt4: toothpick nose man runs around the table, blood streaming from his nose, a chubby dog inspects the blood
